title: windows 7 x64 webdav shows disk size same as local drive
body:
transferred from bug genie:
http://bugs.owncloud.org/thebuggenie/owncloud/issues/oc-1973

reproduced on dec 13 4.5 daily build.

description:
couldn't find any reports like this on here so decided to add one.

whenever i mount the storage using web dav under windows 7 x64 the owncloud drive shows that it is the exact same size as my local disk.

as an example, say i had 1gb free space on local hard drive. if i try and move a 2gb file or group of files that size to the owncloud drive windows gives an error saying there is not enough space left on the drive.

here's a screenshot to show what i mean: http://i.imgur.com/4rrme.png

is there any way to show the quota set for the user instead of what my local drive has free? is there any way to just disable showing the drive size to get past moving files to the owncloud drive issue i explained above?

i've tested this on two different owncloud servers, one was runnning 4.5 and the most recent one is running 5. tried on multiple windows 7 x64 clients and get this same result.

is this something server side or client side? thanks!


reproduction steps:
mount "network drive" in windows 7 x64 using web dav address

refresh my computer screen once drive is connected
